Operation 'post-notifyShopper' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary uses indirect language ('Ask issuer') that may confuse AI agents about the actual operation. Description lacks clarity about required inputs (shopper reference, payment details) and expected outputs (confirmation status). Added specificity about what inputs are required, what the operation returns, and clarified the regional scope to improve AI agent interpretability and actionability.

data.current_summary: Ask issuer to notify the shopper
data.current_description: Sends a request to the issuer so they can inform the shopper about the upcoming recurring payment. This endpoint is used only for local acquiring in India. For more information, refer to [Recurring card payments in India](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/cards-recurring-india).
data.summary_suggestion: Notify shopper of upcoming recurring payment
data.description_suggestion: Sends a notification request to the card issuer to inform the shopper about an upcoming recurring payment. This operation is used exclusively for local card acquiring in India and requires the shopper reference and payment details. The issuer processes the notification and returns a confirmation status. Refer to [Recurring card payments in India](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/cards-recurring-india) for regional requirements.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses indirect language ('Ask issuer') that may confuse AI agents about the actual operation. Description lacks clarity about required inputs (shopper reference, payment details) and expected outputs (confirmation status). Added specificity about what inputs are required, what the operation returns, and clarified the regional scope to improve AI agent interpretability and actionability.

message: Operation 'post-scheduleAccountUpdater' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate but description focuses only on input requirements without explaining the operation's purpose, effect, or output. Missing information about what Account Updater does (validates/updates card details), when the update occurs (asynchronously), and what is returned. Added clarity about the operation's purpose, side effects (asynchronous card detail updates), and expected response to improve AI agent understanding of when and why to use this operation.

data.current_description:
When making the API call, you can submit either the credit card information, or the recurring detail reference and the shopper reference:
 * If the card information is provided, all the sub-fields for `card` are mandatory.
 * If the recurring detail reference is provided, the fields for `shopperReference` and `selectedRecurringDetailReference` are mandatory.
data.description_suggestion: Schedules the Account Updater service to refresh stored card details. Accepts either direct card information or a reference to an existing stored payment method via recurring detail reference and shopper reference. When card information is provided, all card sub-fields are required. When using a stored payment method reference, shopperReference and selectedRecurringDetailReference are required. The Account Updater will validate and update card details asynchronously, returning a confirmation of the scheduled update.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description focuses only on input requirements without explaining the operation's purpose, effect, or output. Missing information about what Account Updater does (validates/updates card details), when the update occurs (asynchronously), and what is returned. Added clarity about the operation's purpose, side effects (asynchronous card detail updates), and expected response to improve AI agent understanding of when and why to use this operation.
